# RealVNC Installation Guide for Mac

RealVNC is a remote desktop software that allows you to access your computer from anywhere. Follow the steps below to install RealVNC on your macOS.

## Prerequisites

Before you begin, ensure that you have administrative privileges on your Mac.

## Installation Steps

### 1. Download RealVNC Viewer

Visit the RealVNC Viewer download page at [https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/combined/](https://www.realvnc.com/en/connect/download/combined/) and click on the "Download for macOS" button to download the installer.

![Downlaod RealVNC](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-1.png)

### 2. Install RealVNC Viewer:

Locate the downloaded installer file (usually in your Downloads folder) and double-click on it to start the installation process and click on "Allow" when prompted.

![Run Installer](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-2.png)

![Allow Installation](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-3.png)

### 3. Follow Installation Wizard

The installation wizard will guide you through the installation process. Click on "Customize installation" and "Deselect RealVNC Server" and hit "Install".

![Customize Installation](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-4.png)

![Deselect RealVNC Server](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-5.png)

### 4. Launch RealVNC Viewer

Once the installation is complete, you can launch RealVNC Viewer by clicking on the "Launch" button or launch it from Launchpad. If prompted to Log in/Sign Up hit "Cancel", you're **<u>NOT REQUIRED</u>** to sign up.

![Open RealVNC](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-6.png)

![Don't Sign up](images/screenshots/realvnc-mac/screenshot-7.png)

## Conclusion

You have successfully installed RealVNC Viewer on your Mac, allowing you to access and control remote computers with ease.

For more information and support, you can visit the [RealVNC website](https://www.realvnc.com/).
